title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Fields Improvement, Rodgers WR Frustration. Dak-less Cowboys
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Fields Improvement, Rodgers WR Frustration. Dak-less Cowboys
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why Aaron Rodgers' treatment of rookie wide receivers is so predictable, if the Cowboys are toast with Dak Prescott out a reported 7 weeks, and the biggest advantage Lincoln Riley has over other college football coaches.

Then, former Bears and Dolphins HC and FOX NFL analyst Dave Wannstedt joins Colin to discuss NFL Week 1, including Justin Fields’ performance in a win over the Niners (19:00), if the Patriots unimpressive loss to the Dolphins is the first sign New England is on the downslide (26:00), if Aaron Rodgers can get on the same page with his young wide receivers (34:00), if the Cowboys need to sign another QB with Dak out for almost two months (35:00), and if Nebraska can ever return to CFB powerhouse status (47:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
